Name: Bob Came in Pieces
About the game: Bob has crashed on a strange planet, lost a bunch of parts for his ship and above all, is late for work! Find the lost parts and rebuild your ship along the way to solve challenging, physics-based puzzles. You can build your ship any way you like in the ship builder – try to find the coolest ship-design for the puzzle at hand! Rebuild your ship any way You like Find the lost parts and tools for Your ship – You’ll need them to solve puzzles! 25 Chapters of solid level design and clever puzzles Many hours of replayability, with secrets, Achievements, Leaderboards and more
